## [Insurance]{.underline}.  Sponsor shall, at its own expense, secure and maintain in full force and effect during the term of this Agreement insurance in conformance with the provisions contained in this section having (a) minimum limits of liability coverage as set forth in [[Exhibit E](#exhibit-e)]{.underline} to this Agreement, and (b) HOFV shall be named an additional insured to such insurance policies of the Sponsor. Sponsor shall provide HOFV with certificates of insurance evidencing the existence of such insurance policies within ten (10) days after execution of this Agreement. The Parties agree to review the coverages set forth in this Section from time to time to ensure proper coverage reflecting current terms and conditions. {#miscellaneous:insurance}
